Package com.ibm.aglets.security

Class Summary
AgletPermission  
AgletsPermissionBase  
ContextPermission  
DateString The DateString class is a converter between Date and String.
Lifetime The Lifetime class shows life-time of an aglet.
MessagePermission  
PlainAgletPermission  
PlainMessagePermission  
PolicyDB The PolicyDB class accesses Java policy database file and returns permissions for specified code source.
PolicyFileReader The PolicyFileReader class accesses Java policy database file and returns PolicyDB object.
PolicyFileWriter The PolicyFileWriter class writes a PolicyDB object into Java policy database file.
PolicyGrant The PolicyGrant class represents a grant of Java policy database.
PolicyImpl The PolicyImpl class is an implementation of Policy abstract class for Aglets.
PolicyPermission The PolicyPermission class represents a permission in a grant of Java policy database.
Randoms The Randoms class is a set of secure random number generators.
X500Name  
 

Exception Summary
PolicyFileParsingException The PolicyFileParsingException class shows that the file cannot be parsed by the reason of illegal format.
